titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Best of the first five years of the MER, 1993-1997 [electronic resource] produced for the US Patent and Trademark Office ; produced by Cohasset Associates, Inc.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Best of the first five years of the MER, 1993-1997 [electronic resource] produced for the US Patent and Trademark Office ; produced by Cohasset Associates, Inc.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Disc 1. Electronic records management issues and concepts -- Classification, indexing, scheduling, storage and access -- Application issues and concerns -- Disc 2. Legal issues -- Management support.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: On front cover of insert: Managing electronic records national conference.

archdesc.scopecontent: PowerPoint presentations with audio of important presentations from the first five MER conferences organized and sponsored by Cohasset Associates.
